item: Brakes, Tires and service for Chevy 1500 4x4 Truck
notes: This truck has 81K miles and not had brakes or tires replaced. Brake light stays on the dashboard and vibrates when stopping. Tires are completely worn out. It has never been serviced, transmission flushed, rear differential fluid, etc. We can get the work completed in stages if necessary.

Broadsource ordered SIP and now they are unable to deploy sip. Port is tomorrow and customer is asking us to temporarily deploy a PRI to save the port. We can redeploy this device on the next 10-30mb customer with PRI.  Price does not include tax.

Amerprise is upgrading circuit to 8 Mbps, and they have added another location. The radio currently serving their location has been in service about 4 years and needs an upgrade. We have a test of the circuit scheduled for next Tuesday, it would be a good time to upgrade circuit.
